q: SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

early fan favorite teen David Archuleta had outperformed his rival. "You came out here tonight to win, and what we have witnessed is a knockout," said prickly judge Simon Cowell . in a 35-32 win at Detroit, Michael Vick made the most of his first pro start since 2006. He completed 21-of-34 passes for 284 yards and two touchdowns and rushed for 37 yards on seven carries. I'm here to announce that Michael Vick will be the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. I think his performance has exceeded expectations the past several weeks, said Eagles head coach Andy Reid at an evening press conference. "This is not about the health or the performance of Kevin Kolb ... this is more about Michael Vick and his accelerated play." NFL investigating

from a gamma-ray telescope satellite in orbit above the Earth say they have discovered that thunderstorms, in addition to the various other things they do, emit "beams of antimatter" out of their tops. These signals are the first direct evidence that thunderstorms make antimatter particle beams, said David Letterman Briggs, a member of NASA's Gamma-ray Burst Monitor( GBM) Crab nebula is slowly dimming: Scientists scientists has found that the Crab Nebula, once considered to be the most stable source of high

the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night. Carmelo Anthony had 26 points and eight rebounds and Marcus Camby had 20 rebounds for the Nuggets. "We absorbed a lot of points from Allen Iverson ," Lakers coach Phil George Washington said. He got our whole team in foul trouble. Allen Iverson scored 49 points through the first three quarters but was held to a just a layup in the fourth. The Lakers clamped down on the 6-foot guard, forcing the ball out of his hands. There were times when some people were really aggressive about raising it, and we said, "For that?"
